about_the_game:
More than 30 unique towers to build and counting! Discover their special abilities and upgrade them for maximum damage! Each merchant will be happy to show you their special inventory of new and exciting towers. Or take a chance with the mystery chess and get a random tower for less.

Try out the:
🟠Thunder Tower (electrifie multiple enemy at a time)
🔵 Healing tower (Heal you and you friends while you fight)
🟠Guardian Tower (spawn an allie that will patrol)
🔵Slam Tower (attack with a powerful wave but short range) And more!



Start gathering resources quickly before the enemies attack! Starting with no tools and no resources will be hard but craft the right tools and you will discover a whole new set of resources to cut, mine and gather. Craft the missing resources to upgrade your towers and beat the incoming monsters from reaching your life crystal. Use the crafting table to help you quickly progress.

Some handy tools:
🟠Stone Axe (chopping up trees, chop ,chop)
🔵Wooden club (got to defend that crystal)
🟠Iron Shovel (diggity coal and clay)
🔵Stone Pickaxe (Iron hear I come) And more!



Each tool and each weapon in the game has a special skill tree to help you defend your crystal with greater ease. Choose between more than a dozen weapons and armors with unique features. Claim skill points by defeating waves and collecting the experience points from monsters.

Choose from:
🟠Scavenger (Give 20% of getting 2 extra item when gathering)
🔵Spin Attack (Push back enemies near you)
🟠Large Quiver (Shoot more arrow on a target)
🔵Keen Eye 2 (60% Chance to find extra item) And more!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2XXX @ 2.0GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 @ 2.6GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Graphics driver: OpenGL 3.2 or DirectX 11.0

  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Graphics driver: OpenGL 3.2 or DirectX 11.0

short_description: Citywars TD is a cute multiplayer third person Survival Tower Defense. Build towers, gather resources, craft tools, upgrade weapons, level up buildings, expand your city with your friends and work under pressure before the next incoming wave of monsters.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Italian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support
